settings.text: preserving the beauty of natural craftsmanship

settings.title: sun protection
settings.content: Avoid prolonged direct sunlight. Natural rattan can fade or dry out over time. Place pieces in covered outdoor areas or indoors to protect the integrity of the fibers and finish.

settings.title: dusting
settings.content: Dust gently with a soft microfiber cloth or a vacuum brush. Regular upkeep prevents buildup and keeps the woven texture looking clean and fresh.

settings.title: Gentle cleaning
settings.content: Use a damp cloth and a mild, plant-based soap to wipe surfaces seasonally. Avoid soaking. Let air dry completely before covering or placing cushions.

settings.title: Ventilation & drying
settings.content: Ensure good airflow around your pieces. After cleaning or exposure to humidity, allow full drying to avoid mold or moisture damage.

settings.title: Weather Awareness
settings.content: Store or cover during heavy rain or winter months. Rattan is best suited for covered patios, sunrooms, and indoor lounges. Avoid extended outdoor exposure.

settings.title: Heat safety
settings.content: Keep away from open flames and extreme heat. Rattan is a natural fiber and should be positioned thoughtfully in relation to fireplaces or grills.

settings.title: What to avoid
settings.content: Don’t use bleach, ammonia, or abrasive cleaners. Don’t drag furniture—always lift. Avoid heavy saturation with water and standing moisture.

settings.title: sustainable stewardship
settings.content: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.subheading: Designed to Endure. Meant to Be Treasured.
settings.content: Rattan is more than a material—it’s a living expression of craftsmanship, heritage, and natural elegance. Each piece in the Belgian Pearls Collection is handcrafted from sustainably harvested rattan, designed to age gracefully with time and care. This page offers guidance to help you protect, preserve, and celebrate your Realm Outdoor investment.
Have questions about your specific climate, care routine, or styling? Our design team is available to assist you in preserving the artistry of your Realm Outdoor pieces.
